"High Quality Sales and Service!" "He gave me the tutorial and set up the blinds to work perfect!" "Highly recommend this company as well as these two employees specifically."

Reba, our design consultant, was absolutely fabulous to work with. I had previously met with another company that left me feeling confused and not confident about the design choices. We're delighted to hear that our personalized, in-home consultation helped simplify your decision-making and provided you with the high-qualit

Jeremy was very nice and installed our shades to our complete satisfaction. He repaired a previous installed shade that needed adjustment. He was very personable and efficient Response from the owner 4 months ago Thank you for sharing your positive experience with our team! We're delighted to hear that you are satisfied with the installation and repair of your shades, and we look forward to serving you again for any future needs.

Our new shades look amazing! The installation process was very quick. We have a large squat rack in front of our windows and Vincent was able to to work around them without issue. Very happy with our new shades! Response from the owner a month ago Thank you for sharing your positive experience with us! We're thrilled to hear that our team could provide a seamless installation and that you're enjoying your new shades.
